body:
### Summary

The [Combinatorial Sets of Installs](https://spack.readthedocs.io/en/latest/workflows.html#combinatorial-sets-of-installs) should mention using [matrix as a way to install a cartesian product of dependencies](https://spack.readthedocs.io/en/latest/environments.html#spec-matrices). I am assuming this works for the above application. 

The documentation is for spack v0.17.1

### Rationale

_No response_

_No response_

_No response_

### General information

- [X] I have run `spack --version` and reported the version of Spack
- [X] I have searched the issues of this repo and believe this is not a duplicate
title: Documentation for Combinatorial Install doesn't mention matrix
